column4: anyone know how to use GPRS usb modem? i mean networkmanager is bad by design, am i correct?
what make and model is your GPRS modem?
do you have a /dev/ttyUSB0 device when you plug it in?
what do you mean by "and 1 devices"?
essentially, you have to follow the instructions for dialup now, except that you substitute your device name (try out which one).
but why i cant use networkmanager? it is supposed to support gprs?
you can try connecting with network manager. Use the 'Dialup Connections' entry you get when you left click on nm-applet
